key.name: radius-times
key.summary: Percentage of rounded corners for the panel in floating mode, 100 is completely round, 0 is no rounded corners

key.name: float-width
key.summary: The horizontal size (which I'll call "length" or "width" depending on your preference) of the panel when it's in floating mode.

key.name: float-align
key.summary: Alignment of the panel in floating mode, 0 for left, 1 for center, 2 for right

key.name: top-margin
key.summary: The distance between the panel and the top edge of the screen when in floating mode. This setting will not be applied in Solid Mode.

key.name: side-margin
key.summary: The distance between the panel and the left or right edge of the screen when in floating mode. Whether it's the left or right edge depends on whether you're left-aligned or right-aligned. This setting is not available when center-aligned.

key.name: transparent
key.summary: Opacity in floating mode, 0 is completely transparent, 100 is completely opaque. The panel menu also adheres to this setting.

key.name: transparent-menus
key.summary: The name is a legacy issue. It now actually indicates whether the panel menu should apply the same style as the panel, including color, etc., not just opacity.

key.name: transparent-menus-keep-alpha
key.summary: This option indicates whether the panel menu should always remain transparent. By default, it maintains the same transparency as the panel, so it will also become opaque in physical mode. Enabling this option will allow it to remain transparent even in physical mode.

key.name: duration
key.summary: Duration of the animation, may not have an effect on the panel background gradient.

key.name: colors-use-in-static
key.summary: Whether to apply the custom color to physical mode.

key.name: detection-mode
key.summary: The trigger to switch between Solid Mode and Floating Mode. By default, the panel will switch to Solid Mode when windows is close enough, without needing to maximize it.

key.name: background-mode
key.summary: Background style of the panel when floating, 0 for a single background for the entire panel, 1 for applying backgrounds separately to the left, center, and right sections of the panel.

key.name: auto-width
key.summary: Automatically determine the panel's horizontal size. When enabled, float-width will be unavailable.

key.name: solid-type
key.summary: The type of Solid Mode the panel is in. 0 is a dock similar to the default GNOME panel, 1 will hide the panel.
